summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2599, for the improvement of the alley between Hamlin and Shelby Streets in block 25, Denny Fuhrman Addition to the City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt or some bituminous base laid upon a proper concrete foundation, under Ordinance No. 30318 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
